ja444:3.2: adaṁsī → adaṁsi (bj); aḍaṁsī (sya1ed, sya2ed); aḍatthi (pts-vp-pli1) | sacarā → bilarā (bj); biḷārā (sya1ed, sya2ed); patarā (pts-vp-pli1)
ja444:5.2: eḷamūgova bālo → eḷamūgo capalo (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); elamūgo va bālo (pts-vp-pli1)
ja444:5.5: Viññuppasatthañca satañca ṭhānaṁ → viññūpasatthañca satañca ṭhānaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); viññūpasatthaṁ vasitaṁ ca ṭhānaṁ (mr)
ja444:7.4: antimagandhano → gandhino (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ja444:9.6: paddhacarāmhi → baddhacarāsmi (bj); paṭṭhacarāmi (sya1ed, sya2ed); baddhacarāmi (pts-vp-pli1); paṭṭhacarāmhi (mr)
ja444:10.1: bhāsiṁ yamabhāsaneyyaṁ → bhāsissaṁ abhāsaneyyaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); bhāsissa'mabhāsaneyyaṁ (?)
